tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_products (
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_spending_patterns(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES financial_products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10,2),
  category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE services (
  service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE Orders (
   order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   customer_id INT,
   product_id INT,
   quantity INT,
   order_date DATE
);
